website_summaries.verdict: A fast-acting hair removal cream that is gentle and safe to use on damaged, unhealthy skin.
pros: Uses a mixture of ingredients that promotes good skin health
Includes aloe vera for pain relief from sunburns and other damaged skin conditions
Easy to apply in a variety of areas around the body
cons: Results only last for a day or two

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a girl and I bought Nad's for Men for...ahem...my thicker hair areas and I was very impressed! I applied a thin layer and left it on for 5 minutes. Little to no tingling and all of the hair came off! Best of all, my skin was not irritated, red, or burning during and afterwards. I rinsed, applied some baby powder, and now I'm admiring my handy work! Def. would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: theBruinette

customer_reviews.title: Let's cut to the chase...
customer_reviews.text: We know why you're likely here: manscaping for yourself or your partner. I'll make this brief: I'm a pale Irish guy with sensitive skin. I used it 'unconventionally,' but otherwise, still as directed. Left it on down there for six minutes, no burning, no itching, no overt irritation; though the skin around my base was a little sensitive for a day after, as if I had been lightly sunburnt. The product worked amazingly and removed all hair. I would highly recommend as an alternative to shaving and waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Caused Blisters!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on my husband's on my back and once we wiped it off his back broke out in blisters! It did remove all the hair and part of his skin with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Followed the instructions, still got burned
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm honestly embraced to show my legs now and they hurt. I followed the instructions perfectly. Apply to small area first, give it a day and see if you react poorly to it. All seemed well, so I went to use it on my legs and as you can see from the picture, this stuff just burnt me like crazy. I went 4 minutes with this stuff on and started to notice the burn when I was cleaning it off. I hopped in the shower and rinsed with cold water for about 15 minutes, unfortunately that didn't stop what had already been done. Save yourself the embarrassment and the pain, go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Its okay but it does work
customer_reviews.text: I am hispanic and it worked fine. It doesnt give you a close skin type shave as Id like but I didnt put a thick layer as I should of. Thats hard to do within the few minutes you have. I mostly got it for my side ab area and looks pretty good. Im not too hairy on chest but enough that I would need a 2nd application. What Is important to know is that lighter skin people would get a rash from this compared to others. Didnt burn for me. Keyword: THICCC
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! Everything down there is completely hairless and butter smooth. I didn't even bother trimming first. Left it on for 8 minutes before wiping it off. Very slight tingling and mild odor. The odor was quickly eliminated with a shot of air freshener.
customer_reviews.author: TexasAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Product from 2007, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Received a product that was packaged in 2007 aka 13 years old!! DO NOT BUY. Also note that the packaging says it expires after 6 months...
customer_reviews.author: Tsolo

customer_reviews.title: YOUR BALLS WILL CURSE YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now, if you call your product "Nads", shouldn't you be able to use it, oh, I don't know....ON YOUR NADS!?!?!?!? But this product clearly states (but not in the Amazon product description) don't use on your nads or taint. I wanted to feel the breeze on my balls. I wanted a slick, smooth gooch, but alas the misleading name of this product will insure that I must endure either many painful nicks and cuts or go through life with hairy jewels and a fuzzy grundle.
customer_reviews.author: E-Dub

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT use this on the sack
customer_reviews.text: feels like i've been punched (day after). still red/irritated. not pleasant at all. putrid odor, when applying/waiting...then, it's a very tight window between when it's TOO long and when it's the right amount of time. I imagine, if I did exactly the right amount of time...and, maybe, had someone to assist with removing it, it could be done without much subsequent pain....but, it's really bad. redness/pain. maybe, this could be used for legs/chest/arms...but, thinking about 'men's' nads...i'd think it would be possible to use it on 'men's' parts. not. the. case.
customer_reviews.author: R. Housman

customer_reviews.title: It simply doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this product on various areas on my body and it never removed hair. I tried different thicknesses of layers with different times left on and it just wouldn't remove my hair. Granted I have fairly course hair so perhaps it doesn't do well with thicker sorts of body hair. I simply cannot recommend this product because it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time Or Money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work very well. It has a strong chemical smell that somewhat lingers on the skin. It's not easy to use. There's a hard balance between applying and keeping an eye on time to stay in the suggested guidelines so as not to cause any harm to your skin. Even pushing the limits, it doesn't work very well. After a few attempts, I just discarded the rest of the bottom. Waste of time and money imo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero problems.
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm not known for being bright I went straight for the balls without testing on a less sensitive area first. Worked surprisingly well, and I'll be trying in other areas soon. I didn't feel any burning aside from a very slight tingle.
customer_reviews.author: MadMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly at first
customer_reviews.text: In general I don't like hair removal creams. There messy,smell bad, and can irritate skin. The Nads for men is a lot more mild than the Nair. Do the skin test then use in a small area at first. May have to use two or three times to get all the hair. Any remaining hair will be easier to remove the second application. You can just go for it first time. I wouldn't recommend you do that. Anyone that's had a bad experience with this. Would give the same advice.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bishop

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of work to use this
customer_reviews.text: Firstly this product is not suitable for sensitive skin, and need to be extremely cautions even if you have a mosquito bite which you have scratched a little. This gave me a rash on my shin which took a while to fade. So I would be cautious while using it on sensitive skin. I was also hoping it would remove all hair effortlessly. But in fact you will need tons of paper roll or cloth to clean it up. And you may have to trim most of the remaining hair on the body. I would give this product 4/5 due to the fair amount of it's effeciency and low price. Since I got that rash, I stepped down to 3/5.
customer_reviews.author: Derek twist

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, good.
customer_reviews.text: It works well as advertised. I was able to do my chest but someone had to do my back. I got some on my nipples. Not a good idea. They were very sensitive for a few days afterwards, they were ok, but sensitive so that kind of told me that using it on genitals might not be recommended. It kind of "cuts" the hair at their base. It doesn't take long, barely a day, that you feel the stubbles already and your partner won't want to lean on your stomach unless you maintain it perfectly. Mine is going back, don't plan to repeat the experience even though it was interesting.
customer_reviews.author: cpu99

customer_reviews.title: 2nd try maybe 3rd?
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job but not well. It’s really cheap though so no complaints other than I should have bought two because sometimes hair won’t come off after applying I’m a dude and getting ready to swim and don’t like my hairs during summer time
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Nads was not the problem. My course hair is
customer_reviews.text: I am Africa America. I have course hair. Nads is not the problem. Its my hair on my skin. And i use it all over my body. Even the areas where it say not to. So Nads wasn't the problem. I need something stronger then this. I use Nair. Thats my favorites. Ever since COVID happen. I can't find Nair anywhere. The only thing about Nads its not easy to put on. Nair is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, beats shaving to manscape
customer_reviews.text: This works and is way better than shaving. I use this below the belt too and the aloe keeps the redness to a minimum. If you are just starting out, definitely use a trimmer with a one or two guard before. I use it once a week and it takes me about half the time it would shaving. The smell is not overpowering and I've only experienced slight irritation to the skin if any. My skin is taking to it much better the 3rd and 4th times. I'm probably going to start to buy the bigger bottle. I'm not very hairy at all but I go through this smaller bottle after about three uses (probably less).
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Throw your razor away!
customer_reviews.text: Put it on thick. I’m not very hairy but use it on my stomach and chest. 7 minutes works best for me! I wipe it off with a wet washcloth and finish cleaning off product in the shower. I only go about an inch below my belt. I use a norelco bodygroom for the bits. I do not get any skin irritation or razor bumps ( I have very sensitive skin) I would never use anything else as this product is much gentler than razors or electric body groomer.
customer_reviews.author: The dude

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't beat shaving
customer_reviews.text: So I have tried several times to like this product but I can't. It smells aweful but I wont fault it for that since that isn't its purpose. It fails to remove hair. You can only do 1 application, if you try to do it again to get the hairs it missed, you will get chemical burns or open sores. It misses quite a bit of hair, unless you really cake it on, even then, it still misses a few. Worst though, it leaves stubble- in the end a regular shave is way less trouble, faster and way better results. Twice now this product has left me in discomfort after using it, and that is twice too many.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: So far, the best option.
customer_reviews.text: Practice makes perfict. This product works. But you need to lather this cream on entirely covering your hair. If you have a lot, I suggest prepping with an electric shaver with a #1 or 2 guard. You might need a few touchups 3 days later. Better than waxing, and shaving with your razor. Rinsing off? Use your shower jell. The smell? Worse than a perm. Soak towels for 3 days in detergant. Recomend.
customer_reviews.author: LLSteelersfan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my forearms as well as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my forearms as well as I thought. I have medium body hair, certainly not coarse or dense. Lower legs/calves worked decently. Does stink, but less than some other products I've seen wife use in the past. Does not come with applicator. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Let me begin by saying I have very sensitive skin. Shaving with a razor results in bad razor burn on most of my body. I use this on my most sensitive areas and I have no problem at all. It works great but you have to put it on very thick depending on how dense your hair is. I usually leave it on a little longer than recommended and still do not have any issues. The only complaint I could have is that it has a strong smell but I usually shower to rinse it off anyway so it does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works in the forbidden are
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a product that can double as chest/stomach hair removal as well as the more delicate areas down below. Watched a review of this and bought a bunch. Used it and wow it really worked down there. When I say down there, I removed all hair down there with no irritation. Shaving down there is to difficult, but this is well worth not having to wax!
customer_reviews.author: Ksolo3223

customer_reviews.title: LEOs BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading instructions for this product, I decided to only leave the cream on for 6 mins (middle ground per instructions) and it took almost no hair off. I waited a full 24 hours before trying again because the chemicals made my skin feel as if it was fake. So weird...The second attempt I left the cream on for the full ten minutes, and it still only took some of the targeted hair off in patches. Then, a day later I had HORRIBLE ingrown hairs and bumps all over the belt line where my duty belt rides. Definitely will spend the extra time and go back to the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin & Asa Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Nads is not for 'nads'
customer_reviews.text: Don't even try this on your nads. You will regret it for days. Follow the directions, not the name of the product. The directions tell you to avoid that area. The name of the product would lead you to believe this is specifically for that area. Don't let the name deceive you: Nads will change the life of your 'nads' for days !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works
customer_reviews.text: This product most certainly works! I used as it’s directed, had very thick leg hair and the product left me nice and smooth. I did use basically the entire bottle because my leg hair has always been very thick. I recommend this product, no rash, no irritation, the smell isn’t bad at all, and it’s hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY PEASY!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very strong after all it is a hair removal cream. Fearing irritation, I decided to apply it initially on my sack and perineal area first. Second application after all was ok would be on my butt crack. First application was well. I followed instruction. Nads says not to apply on groin area but come on, why did you purchase this product but to remove unwanted hair? It wipes off quite easily . Just wash with soap to remove all cream and avoid itritstion.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, I've been using Nair previously and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, I've been using Nair previously and it worked fine so decided to give this a try since it had some good reviews. I'm a white male with light brown hair and very little chest hair. I applied this to my chest and stomach and waited four minutes, tested a small spot, nothing, waiting 10 minutes and started using a wet wash cloth to remove and it took about 60% of the hair and left me very patchy. I had to hop in the shower and rinse off and shave the rest of my chest which resulted it razer burn which I've never gotten from shaving before.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man.. I use this because as a man I get hair in man spots AND THIS WILL REMOVE hair from any manly spot! Just make sure you apply a thick evenly fully covered layer so you won't have to try again like me. Because it will burn... pretty bad....and I can take pain.......
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: A perfect alternative to trimmers
customer_reviews.text: Its a scary move to use trimmers/ blades on skin. The Nad's for Men Hair Removal Cream is just a perfect solution for Men who keep themselves trim and chic! You never know when you get lucky! I've used the Nad's for over two years now and I've stopped using trimmers ever since. I have them on my subscriptions every 6 months and it is perfect to be used once every month. This isn't too bad on my skin if I simply follow the instructions- 6 minutes and nothing more. It is smooth, scent free and perfect alternative to the scary trimmers that you've been using all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu

customer_reviews.title: Stinky stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I found it easiest to shave and trim prior to applying. The cream seems to work best on shorter hair and less so on longer hair. I'll continue trying it, but I'm not thrilled about the results. It works, but I found the efficiency and consistency questionable. Also the hair just kind of wipes off, but sometimes in partial patches. I couldn't figure out why some areas worked better than others, despite having had cream applied equally and for the same length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K

customer_reviews.title: Works great smells a little though
customer_reviews.text: So this is my first time trying a hair removal creme. I have a chest tattoo and it was getting buried in all my hair so I decided to try this. Works as intended I tested a small area on my stomach first and it wiped away no issues. So the creme is white and pretty thick but not too crazy. The smell is not great lol but again this is my first creme so I can’t compare it. As I right this my chest is a little tingly but not red will update later if it gets worse * Update next day no redness or irritation
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: After my purchase two months ago, I finally worked up the courage to try this. Arms, legs, chest and south. It does work well, but I do feel some stubble after a couple of days. Maybe more sessions will help. Only burning was on sternum (serious red bumps) and the skin right above Mr. Winky-Dink. No burning with the boys. It certainly has a strong odor! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy-not Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Works great but smells gross.
customer_reviews.text: I have very coarse hair and have to use this at least twice for several minutes over a few days for the best result. I've also used this 'down there' and it works great. A big negative is a nasty smell this stuff emits. It's putrid-smelling, top it off it leaves a gross after smell on the skin. Other than the smell this stuff works like charm, no skin irritation or anything so that's a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Does the job for your private areas, although it says not to use it there...I still do. I just make sure not to go over 10 minutes. I've noticed that the hair grows back thinner after the third application. Cons: the smell. I thought it would smell better than other hair removal creams but it actually smells like the others. Small price to pay for better hair removal down there.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but has issue (at least with me)
customer_reviews.text: Used it for over a month & it's helpful in removing MOST hair but not all of it in my case. After putting on enough to leave the whole area white in cream & can see some of the hair sticking out, leaving on for 8 minutes & then removing before any burns occur, it never takes all the hair off still. I get left with the roots so passing my hand over it feels like I'm rubbing my chin one or 2 days after not shaving. Still better than getting razor bumps but can anyone tell me how much I should put on to remove all the hair, including the roots?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a 3 star for me...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my armpits...thinking since it was a mens formula, it would take care of coarser hair. I've tried everything and I'm still not impressed. I use a very thick coat, leave it on for longer...still doesn't do the job like I expected. The product had great reviews, so I was hoping for great results. I don't think ill be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: DavisHM

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product 3 times without great results. I use it on the coarse hair on inner thighs. Even when I use it for the maximum time allowed, I still have hairs that seem untouched after rinsing. The product causes problems for ingrown hairs. I end up with sores where the lotion tries to dissolve partially exposed hairs. The smell isn't that bad and doesn't last after rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It works great, even on the thicker hair (back).
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Read the instructions folks - used as directed - no problem. Rub it in - you will burn. Leave it on too long - you will burn. Apply a thin coat, do NOT rub in, rinse off after 5 minutes. Set a timer if you need to. This is the best product for hair removal that I have had, except for laser ($$$$$).
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works great, will definitely keep using
customer_reviews.text: When it leaves stubble it is the shortest and non prickly kind. I'm tired of the stay hairs on the root and shaft of my dik so after I tested it to see if I got any allergic reaction and was fine I put it around my whole shaft, of course not on or close to the tip, and removed the hair that was bothering me. Works especially good on thin hair and the thick hairs that remain you can easily and painlessly be pulled off with your fingers. I also saw a review that recommended cutting the hairs a bit short and I think that definitely helped
customer_reviews.author: Javier Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my balls.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this back about 6 months ago have been happy with it ever since. Im african american so i guess it just takes a little more cream to remove the hairs for me. It does have a stinky smell when applied, but no burns or irritation. Your lady will appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: Rashad Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your downstairs
customer_reviews.text: Let me just with Wow this product is legendary. I hate having hair on my lower regions and I put this stuff in and my jungle went to meadow. I thought it couldn't get any better. It says do not put on your nuts but I thought I'd try it out. I thought to myself I think I can handle the burn if it so happens to be there. No burn what so ever. Still I don't recommend putting on your jewels because I could just have beautiful skin. The smell is terrible which is only the poor part but with a little ball/pubic deodorant you feel fresh and smell good. It made my 1inch wonder into a 2incher pincher.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Young

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hair removal cream; sensitive skin be cautious
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful hair removal cream! Now note; I would advise this for folk who don’t have sensitive skin. I, myself, tested this on a small piece of my skin to see how I reacted. Very well with no chemical burns nor any pain or discomfort. Took anywhere from 5-7 mins to actually get my hair removed because whatever reason mine is pretty tough and didn’t want to let go. Nonetheless, afterwards when I was done I took a shower to wash off the excess and my legs were completely clean! Even after growing back I never developed razor bumps or in grown hairs maybe one? But nothing to cause scratching or irritation. Really good product here
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: Leaves behind lots of hair. Claims this is a 4 min speed formulation. Used twice, once at 4 min once at 10 min. 4 min provide almost no results. 10 min provided not much of an improvement. I had used The Bare Pair King Kombo but it was no longer available. I just recently found out Kombo is back in stock! It's a much better product. I threw out all the Nad's and ordered the good stuff - Kombo !
customer_reviews.author: Clarm Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I don't think my hair is super thick. Nair works
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. I don't think my hair is super thick. Nair works. But this stuff didn't do anything. Waiting the 4 minutes wouldn't wipe any hair away. Added more. Ended up waiting 12 minutes total before giving up on it
customer_reviews.author: bryan scopazzi

customer_reviews.title: Smoother than a shave
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty fast. After only four minutes, the hair will wipe away. Normally if you don't hit the right amount of time, you're left with a smattering of tiny hairs which sort of defeats the purpose. So you're clean and smooth without a lot of time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Literally did nothing to the hair on my body.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product twice, 3 days apart. Followed the directions to the letter, applied the cream to the area I wanted to remove hair from and waited before wiping off and cleaning the area. The first time, I left the product on for 4 minutes, as recommended. No hair was removed. The second time, I left the cream on for 10 minutes (the maximum recommended in the directions). I wiped and cleaned the area, and NO HAIR WAS REMOVED AT ALL. This product did nothing at all and was a complete waste of money. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than others try it
customer_reviews.text: If you have a spot where you don't want to shave or can't, this is the ticket. I Put it on, shaved face (about 8 minutes) wiped it off and then showered. Not perfect but close. Lower Area got a little warm but not bad. So much easier than shaving. I've tried others that were nasty but this is ok. Used it on my under arms as well because I always wind up bleeding and sore if I shave there. A little goes a long ways too. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: Smooooooth!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first because it didn't seem to work in all areas. After some experimentation I concluded I needed to put it on a bit thicker and leave it on for a solid 10 minutes. That's not advice, I'm sure everyone is different. I'm just saying if it doesn't work the first or second time, try adjusting your routine a Little at a time and see what works for you. And to answer the big question, yes I'm using it everywhere. Yes, there too, and even There!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: dont buy let me tell you why !
customer_reviews.text: 1 its chemical 2 time consuming 3 burn your skin it’s just like hair relaxer for hair salon and it’s way stronger that why it’s take few mins to remove , Take a longtime compare to machine trimmer, it’s sensitive for skin I know it’s not burning for everyone but still not good for skin .i used few times and throw to garbage..
customer_reviews.author: chaffee wang

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well for me, might not for others
customer_reviews.text: First off I'll start by saying that when I applied this, it mever perfectly removed the hairs, but it did well enough for my satisfaction. Also, I could apply it just about anywhere without any unpleasant after effects, but that may differ for you, if other reviews are anything to go by. While it's quite good for me, it might not for you. It won't exactly put you out a ton of money to try it though, about $3.50 at the time of writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Buy Nair Cream Instead
customer_reviews.text: This product is weak in comparison to it's competition. Double application, and THICK, is necessary for me to remove abdominal hair usually wiped away easily with Nair's cream. This stuff works, but despite cheap price tag, is actually more expensive in the amount to product necessary for the same result as the competitive brand.
customer_reviews.author: GregM

customer_reviews.title: With trial and error- it works.. BUT SMELLS HORRIBLE..
customer_reviews.text: There is a very thin time line between failing to remove all hairs in the target area and a super smooth chemical burn.. it works don't get me wrong. You'll just have to do it a time or two to figure out how long YOU need to keep the product applied for. This was the part that was the biggest turn off for me. - the scent is absolutely horrible. Like, makes me want to gag every time I use this product. Not to mention the fact that the scent lingers after washing with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Hippo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Nads!
customer_reviews.text: I know, the instructions say not to use this on your sensitive man parts, but lets be honest....that's what this product is for. I use this about every 2 weeks (on you know where) and I LOVE the silky smooth feeling it leaves afterwards. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: This works great if all you want is a smellier way to shave. It only removed hair at the surface and not under the skin as it claims. The stubble is back just as fast as when I shave, so no benefit and I leave it on the full 10 minutes. Tried it on my face and other body parts with the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: Apophis

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, May Cause Redness. .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother who complains about having a bad back full of hair. We tried it on his back you may want to leave a thicker coat and wait longer we tried 6 minutes wait time but it didnt feel like it worked right. 10 minutes seemed better. After it was off we noticed redness on one side but not the other. I put some hydrocortisone on that side and it worked. He is hair free, have yet to do it on other parts yet but his bsck is hair free!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not for ethnic body hair
customer_reviews.text: im a woman of color with coarse hair so i thought this would be ideal for me, but its far inferior to veet and nair. It serves as merely a relaxer for both pubic hair and leg hair even after waiting 13 minutes instead of the 6 minutes in the intructions. 3 stars because the product arrived as promised. Wouldnt but again. I had to go over with a razor, so it basically a glorified shaving cream
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, believing the commercial. It was false advertisement; it doesn't work. Not only does it not work, the customer servicer is terrible...TERRIBLE!! I have reached out four times to NAD's customer service here in the US and in Australia, for advice on using the product, nothing. If you want something that will definitely work, but may smell a little worse than this, use Nairobis for Men. I know that works as advertised, this products commercials show fake results.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Women tested, women approved
customer_reviews.text: Snells like Nair, yes it smells but what do you expect? floral smell. Any hair remover cream is going to smell, I tested one part for a reaction and got none so I proceeded top do different areas. 5 min did the trick, did bikini area, butt, arm pits. People every body reacts differently to any product. you have to try it on you not just take others word for stuff.. as it worked for me I will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this surprisingly does well however, it says you only need to leave it on for 4 minutes, but for people with coarse hair like mine it won't remove hair in certain areas. I use it on my genitals and it doesn't cause burn. It does make your skin super sensitive and I wouldn't recommend using a razor with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Might just be my skin and hair type, but this didn't work at all for me. Tried the first time for 4 minutes and it didn't remove any hair. Tried a second time and after 10 minutes it removed less than half of the hair in the applied areas. It did start to burn after about 5 minutes, and left irritated red patches on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Smells but definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: Has a strong smell but what do you honestly expect for a product that disintegrates your hair (lmao). It does it's job (personally I use it down under although it recommends otherwise) but have never had a problem. Leaves that nice, smooooth feel that last a tad longer than shaving will. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Puff

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than Nair!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Nair. The stuff left my skin pink and itchy, but livable. Decided to try this product, and wow! Now for me (like with Nair) it took the whole ten minutes. But with this there was very little pink skin, almost no itchiness, and ZERO burning. No patches left to take care of later either! And yes, I’m male and use it you know where. I’ll not be buying Nair anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is difficult to remove from skin. It says it works within 4 minutes, but it doesn't. At least not where it's intended. Even after 10 mins which is the maximum unless you want burnt skin.it doesn't dissolve well. To get it off your skin, you habe to rub it off which after it's ise,.leabes your skin very sensitive. The directions say not to rub it in but that's what you end up doing getting it off.
customer_reviews.author: Grogers767

customer_reviews.title: Works well but be careful
customer_reviews.text: It works really well but you have to be careful because if you leave it on too long it starts burning. Pros: -Easy to use -Works fast. 10 min at the most. -Easy to apply -No razor burns -Skin is smooth afterwards -Easy to wash off Cons: -Burns if left on too long or if it's applied to sensitive areas -Smells horrible -You have to use a generous amount each time
customer_reviews.author: Diego Santillan

customer_reviews.title: Does work fairly well , but I absolutely detest the smell.
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. I can't stand the smell of if though, it has a very chemical Like scent. I guess that makes sense since that's precisely what it is. I was concerned it would be harsh on the skin as I have sensitive skin , prone to razor rash , and it really wasn't that bad. Actually less sensitive than using a razor in certain places. You do have to use a lot of it, more than you would initially think ( at least for me ). It won't completely replace shaving for me but I will continue to use it , not on my face but on the body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT TO SURE BOUT DIS.
customer_reviews.text: OK, Here's my problem with this products, First off let me say. Just purchased & after reading have not used this products & don't plan to. Why? Good question. Why is this product called (NAD's FOR MEN) if you can't use the freaking thing on your GONADS? what kind of false fake advertising is that!
customer_reviews.author: Pque

customer_reviews.title: Works Decently
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells exactly like what it is doing. Burning off your hair! Unfortunately, this stuff does not work on every part of your body and seems to work better if the hair is already decently long. Considering it works better than most products I’ve used I can’t really complain. Although that smell! Yeesh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for literate people
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I’m using it off label. My bum and bits are smooth without issue. But. I read the instructions... you should too! Don’t be an idiot. Test it first... on the skin area you want to rid of hair... don’t test your arm then use it on your twig and berries. You’re not smart if you claim burns... all I have to say is DARWIN!!! Please do not procreate!!!
customer_reviews.author: like me, please

customer_reviews.title: Works for me. Beats shaving
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. It does cause some minor redness and skin irritation but actually a lot less than just regular old shaving or (ouch) waxing certainly. I found that even the areas that are only partially depilated (such as 'kinkier' areas) the hairs are rendered easily enough to pluck out (gently!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product is very in effective. It doesn't last for long and it leaves the consumer gross feeling. I had to use 4 bottles for what one razor would a complish. Not only that but a razor wouldn't leave chemical burns such as this did. I can tell I'm not allergic cause it only affected small and diverse areas. But I promise I tried to like your product but it just left me unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mortal

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!! PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, used it on my chest and I regretted it immediately. Bought this to avoide ingrown hairs, but ended up still developing them. The scent is also unpleasant. Lastly, worst of all if you get the slightest drop of the cream on your nipples, it will BURN them and make them raw and scabbed. I wouldn’t recommend this to my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Not a doer, a maintainer.
customer_reviews.text: As said in the title, this I doubt this product is intended for doing the job, but more intended for maintaining. I had full grown body hair and tried the product. It did not work as intended. So I then decided to trim first, and then apply the product. Even then I had to apply the product two days in a row to get the results I wanted. This leads me to believe this product is intended to maintain a bald body, as opposed to getting there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns like an Eminem diss track
customer_reviews.text: If you like burning skin like a hot tub of loava, go for it. If you want your skin chemically sckrthee off, go for it. If you love laying down fanning yourself like you just stuck your thumb on a hot stove......go for it. And guess what? Go for it if you love a burning, itchy, miserable feeling that lasts longer than 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Tennant

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money...used it to remove back hair etc...left on the alooted time allowed and did not work...tried wiping off and only spots cameoff...had to reapply..still did not take off hair as advertised...poor quality...my wife nair worked better...will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works great, lather on thick if you want 100% effectiveness, I left it on longer than recommended and it did not hurt, just some tingling, it’s best to have a high power shower to rinse off quickly, or even a removable shower head with some decent pressure. There’s no scent which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: For Use By Rabid Masochists Only
customer_reviews.text: Good news: The smell is not nearly as bad as some suggest. The bad news: Caused bleeding in a 2 inch radius around the navel. And still did not remove the majority of the hair even after 6 minutes. If you enjoy bleeding and pain, this is for you!! Otherwise, avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: James H. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: It does work!!
customer_reviews.text: First time using something like this! And I have to say it's awesome!! I found it is best to quick trim hair with trimmers first then use this... NADS!!!! And be patient waiting, it might burn for a lil bit but be a man and let it work!!! Trim hairs low quick then apply don't rub in!!! Wait 10 minutes then shower!! Apply generously!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Von D

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good definitely not as good as shaving with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good definitely not as good as shaving with a razor but for areas like your butt crack it gets rid of all the unwanted hairs easily and sufficiently enough. As far as for your happy trail I would just use a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to shaving.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends chest and he loves it. He gets razor burns when he shaves and his chest gets red and bumpy but with this product he doesn’t have an issue. It takes his chest hair right off, and it leaves his skin smooth. I would suggest doing a test spot first before doing a large area in case of sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Saby Selph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my uhh... nads... no pain and removed all the hair just fine, got bored and used all over body and it worked everywhere, only "issue" I had was there was alot of pain in the armpits, but we are baby smooth now so it works
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on the man bits, left it on for 4 mins. Didnt get any results. Tried again couple days later, this time I left it on for 7 mins. Hair just wiped clean off. Cant find a single hair anywhere. Layer it on thick and be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a bad mix or something. I have completely normal amount of hair on my stomach and chest. Nothing coarse or thick. I applied liberally and left on for 4-5 minutes. Nothing. Like I mean not a single hair wiped off. It was crazy. I can apply Nair for Men in the same amount, for less time and it wipes away smooth. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on hairy chest
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I applied it all over my chest and abs with hair length around a centimeter. I have been shaving with a razor for a couple years and wanted to soften the hair to make it easier to grow out and stop shaving. I applied cream and waited about 6 minutes. When I went to wipe off, no hair came off. It actually looked like the hair was more noticeable and became very sharp and uncomfortable. I can see that this might work on very small areas for people with very thin hair but definitely not good for grooming
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: My nipple looks like it had a torch held to it
customer_reviews.text: My nipple is fried. I got the cream on accidentally and I wiped it off immediately, I tried to put on some on the areas I took off where there was hair, and it started stinging and burning. I washed it off but it literally felt like it had been torched. The other nipple got covered in it too but it was perfectly fine. Overall good I guess it got rid of most of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Antonio Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came in a bigger bottle, that's why I only gave it 4 stars. I included a before/after picture to compare my legs after six minutes of leaving on. I wiped it off in the tub with a washcloth and it came off super easy. There isn't really a scent, so it's fairly neutral smelling. It works great on parts of the body with lots of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great, not for thick hair though
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not for thick hair though. Works great for hair that is thinner in areas, but anything think it seems to have trouble actually removing the hair. Tried with the hair longer and shorter, both times has trouble removing thicker hair. But over all good product.
customer_reviews.author: Madison H

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great but read the directions do not leave it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great but read the directions do not leave it on more than four or five minutes I made the mistake the first time because I got busy doing something else and left it on for over 10 minutes you do not want to do that it will take the skin off if you do it properly it is a fantastic product and makes manscaping so easy about every 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: KENT BARNES

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well although it seems like I have to leave it on a little longer each time to get the same results. I am up to 11 minutes now. Dont use it a second time right after washing the first application off. Wait a day or you will be hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Female review! Bought for bikini area and trimmed up before use per another reviewer. Left on for 15ish minutes (longer than the bottle says) and it worked great! The smell didn't bother me and I had no irritation. I absolutely liked it better than having to shave or wax.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for large area
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for using large area of your body like chest and leg it doesn’t work well as it leave few hair; probably works on arms better. I have full bottle of the product that will be going in trash. Guys just use trimmer it will work better , I just wanted to try this product as a lot of good review.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin palkey

customer_reviews.title: Easier than shaving, 95% effective, smells
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horrible and it burns a bit. A surprising amount of hair does come off and it is much easier than trying to shave where the sun doesn’t shine. It only took off 95% of the hair and doing back to back sessions would definitely give me a chem burn.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Huether

customer_reviews.title: Really useless product
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove the hair completely. Followed the instructions step by step even though I’ve already used hair removal creams, but this one left the hair half removed and what was removed the roots were still sticking out partially, had to shave afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Artur

customer_reviews.title: From one hairy guy to another.....
customer_reviews.text: I have never written an online review on a product, but I felt the need to warn anyone trying this. I'm an extremely hairy guy so it may not apply to all. I applied this product to my back expecting for better results than shaving, here are things I have found... 1. If you have coarse hair, it will still look and feel like stubble after removing product. 2. In my experience, the product did burn a few areas of my back leaving red blotches and welts, even while removing it within the instructed time. 3. When rinsing off with cool water, it feels like razor burn. 4. It's a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Left it on 4 minutes: nothing. Left it on 10 minutes: nothing. Left it on 12 minutes: you guessed it, nothing. I’ll stick with my one blade.
customer_reviews.author: chaoslimits

customer_reviews.title: Step right up and test your might!
customer_reviews.text: I was too scared to use this for the reason that I bought it for so I’ll just give it 5 stars as it seems to work for others if used correctly. I have let the forest reclaim the land. Good luck traveler, hopefully you are braver than I!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: burned skin badly
customer_reviews.text: I had bought about 6 tubs for future use, used once and it burned skin easily and through away all the other tubs will never use this product and not recommend to anyone. Be careful 2 min did a pretty good burn of my skin. OUCH!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: Trust me
customer_reviews.text: 7 minuets and still didn’t remove the hair , No good I should’ve returned back but I don’t feel going to the ups office that’s all . Nothing like Veet .
customer_reviews.author: abdulaziz almer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough cream
customer_reviews.text: So I used this product, and the results were patchy at best, so I had to use my razor, then I ran out and had to shave most of my bottom half, which I was hoping to avoid by using this cream. Other than that it was pretty okay tho. It didn't hurt too much, easy to remove, clear instructions, and okayish results.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bönig

product_meta.title: Nad's for Men Hair Removal Cream - Painless Hair Removal For Men - Soothing Depilatory Cream For Unwanted Coarse Male Body Hair, 6.8 Oz
product_meta.description: Style:Hair Removal CreamNad’s For Men Hair Removal Cream is a fast acting depilatory cream for quick, painless hair removal at home with results that last longer than shaving. The extra strength depilatory cream is formulated specially for coarse male body hair and is effective in as little as 4 minutes. Shaving can be quite a time-consuming method to remove unwanted hair. Men’s hair tends to grow back quicker and thicker then women’s hair and needs a hair removal method that is more suitable. A depilatory cream is a good alternative to shaving in that you’ll avoid any razor nicks or cuts. Nad's for Men Hair Removal Cream is ideal for use on large areas of the body like your chest, back, arms and legs and is easily rinsed off in the shower. Nad's for Men Hair Removal Cream contains soothing Aloe Vera to protect the skin and prevent irritation. The fast action 4-minute formula makes it the perfect men’s hair removal solution for the guy on the go.
feature_bullets: Painless hair removal results that last longer than shaving
Extra strength cream formulated for coarse body hair
Works in as little as 4 minutes
Ideal for body, chest, arms and legs. Always wait 72 hours between applications
This product is alkaline and irritant. Prolonged or incorrect exposure may produce burns.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
